predicate.note: Frames file for 'piece' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: It 's [a script]-1 pieced [*]-1 together from interviews by CBS News for a re-enactment , a dramatic rendering by an actor of Mr. Hoffman 's ultimately unsuccessful struggle with depression .
example.arg: for a re-enactment , a dramatic rendering by an actor of Mr. Hoffman 's ultimately unsuccessful struggle with depression
